Articles.Content:
I've actually made multiple SSTO's that could land on the mun, but somehow in the middle of the recording, ksp just crashed obnoxiously. So after many iterations of a mun SSTO, here is one that doesn't crash ksp for me . This craft is 100% reusable as in IF you can land this back at KSC, you can open the cargo bays and fill up the fuel tanks, with a fuel tanker. In my run I had 100 idle oxidizer units left when I landed at kerbin, so make sure you don't fill up every tank with oxidizer. It's stable and looks good, and it is fairly reliable: I made numerous mistakes, but I still got back to kerbin. My full name for it is SSTO "Setto". Make sure you pump your left over oxidizer and fuel into the front tank when coming back to kerbin, because that moves the center of mass forward and that makes the craft stable while decending.

Action groups:

1 - toggle first Jet engine

2 - toggle second Jet engine

3 - toggle nuclear engine

4 - toggle intakes

10 - toggle cargo bays

Javascript is disabled. View full album

If you don't believe it can go to the mun, and back:

BTW, when I got to space I pumped around fuel in my craft so that it was bit more organized. I didn't dock to anything

Download
